name: Bring Me Down
description:
★★★Powered by Unreal Engine 3★★★
★ Universal App for iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch★

★★ New Arcade Mode Available ★★
Balance the platform, collect bananas while avoiding rockets and mines, compete with your friends on Game Center, all in this fresh new arcade game.

★3D PHYSICS PUZZLE GAME★
While most puzzle games take place in 2D worlds, "Bring Me Down" adds a whole new dimension to one of the most popular game genres on the AppStore.

★SIMPLE GAMEPLAY★
Tap a block to pop it, make it explode or stop/start its motion depending on its type.

★TRY TO SAVE ALL BANANAS★
Sounds easy? It’s not. Prepare yourself for a challenge.

✓ An innovative 3D physics Blocks puzzler for the iOS.
✓ Unique level designs.
✓ Game Center Support.
✓ Beautiful 3D Graphics (Powered by Unreal Engine 3)
✓ Extremely Fluid and Realistic Physics
✓ 50 Fun levels to play.
✓ Interactive Hints & Tips.
✓ Save the cute animated character and his bananas.
✓ HD Retina display support - Looks great on iPad & iPad2.
✓ Catchy music track and sound effects.
✓Play Bring Me Down on iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPad, iPad 2, New iPad, iPad Mini, iPod Touch 3 (16 GB and above), iPod Touch 4 and iPod Touch 5.

➤Become a fan of Bring Me Down on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/HanyMalekGames

➤Video Trailer:
